title: Excess Wedding Decorations
description: Beautiful wedding decorations from our recent event. All items are in excellent condition and ready for reuse.
pickupInstructions: Available for pickup Monday-Friday 9AM-5PM. Please call ahead to confirm availability.

title: Leftover Organic Table Linens
description: High-quality organic cotton table linens from a corporate event. Various colors available, all professionally cleaned.
pickupInstructions: Contact us to schedule pickup. Available weekdays 10AM-4PM.

title: Seasonal Flower Arrangements
description: Fresh flower arrangements from a garden party. Perfect for community events or smaller gatherings.
pickupInstructions: Confirmed pickup for January 20th at 2PM. Please bring containers for transport.

title: LED String Lights
description: Energy-efficient LED string lights from outdoor event. All tested and working perfectly.
impactNotes: Successfully used for community garden lighting project. Great impact on local sustainability efforts.
pickupInstructions: Completed - items successfully donated and used.

title: Plant-Based Catering Leftovers
description: Fresh, organic plant-based food from corporate event. All items properly stored and safe for consumption.
pickupInstructions: Must be picked up within 24 hours. Contact us immediately for urgent pickup.

title: Bamboo Dinnerware Collection
description: Complete set of bamboo dinnerware from eco-friendly wedding. All items are biodegradable and in perfect condition.
pickupInstructions: Available for pickup any weekday. Please call to schedule.

title: Recycled Glass Vases
description: Unique vases made from recycled glass. Perfect for flower arrangements or decorative purposes.
pickupInstructions: Pending confirmation. Will contact you within 24 hours.

title: Hemp Table Runners
description: Sustainable hemp table runners from rustic wedding. Various lengths and natural colors available.

title: Solar-Powered Lanterns
description: Charming solar-powered lanterns from outdoor event. All fully functional and weather-resistant.
impactNotes: Used for community night market lighting. Great success and positive feedback from organizers.

title: Wildflower Seed Packets
description: Extra wildflower seed packets from wedding favors. Perfect for community gardens or educational programs.
